00011 namespace TripiWCF.Service
00012 {
00013     public class TripServiceXml : TripService, ITripService, ICrossDomainPolicyResponder
00014     {
00015         #region Private fields
00016         private static Dictionary<string, string> Users = new Dictionary<string, string>()
00017         {
00018             {"Aha", "test"},
00019             {"Asia", "test"},
00020             {"Staro", "ble"},
00021             {"echudzin", "best"}
00022         };
00023 
00024         private const string DirectoryPrefix = @".\XmlData\";
00025 
00026         private const string TripsFile = DirectoryPrefix + @"UserTrips.xml";
00027 
00028         private static string NodesFile(int tripID)
00029         {
00030             return DirectoryPrefix + String.Format(@"Trip{0}.xml", tripID);
00031         }
00032         #endregion
00033 
00034         #region Constructor
00035         public TripServiceXml()
00036         {
00037             if (!Directory.Exists(DirectoryPrefix)) Directory.CreateDirectory(DirectoryPrefix);
00038         }
00039         #endregion
00040 
00041         #region Xml file helpz0rs
00042         private static XElement AssureFileExists(string xmlFileName, string rootNodeName)
00043         {
00044             if (File.Exists(xmlFileName)) return XElement.Load(xmlFileName, LoadOptions.None);
00045             else return new XElement(rootNodeName);
00046         }
00047 
00048         private IEnumerable<XElement> TryLoadElements(string xmlFileName)
00049         {
00050             try
00051             {
00052                 return XElement.Load(xmlFileName, LoadOptions.None).Elements();
00053             }
00054             catch (FileNotFoundException exc)
00055             {
00056                 OnDatabaseQuery("Xml file not created yet: " + exc.FileName);
00057             }
00058             catch (System.Xml.XmlException exc)
00059             {
00060                 OnDatabaseQuery("Error in xml: " + exc.Message);
00061             }
00062             catch (DirectoryNotFoundException)
00063             {
00064                 OnDatabaseQuery("Data directory not created yet!");
00065             }
00066             return new List<XElement>();
00067         }
00068         #endregion
00069 
00070         #region ITripService - security
00071         public override string LoginUser(string username, string password)
00072         {
00073             OnDatabaseQuery("Login attempt: " + username);
00074             if (Users.ContainsKey(username) && Users[username] == password) return "luz";
00075             return "";
00076         }
00077         #endregion
00078 
00079         #region ITripService - trips
00080         public override int CreateNewTrip(string username, string tripName, string tripDescription)
00081         {
00082             XElement traps = AssureFileExists(TripsFile, "Trips");
00083             Trip temp = new Trip(username, TripCount(traps), tripName, tripDescription);
00084             traps.Add(temp.ToXElement());
00085             traps.Save(TripsFile);
00086 
00087             OnDatabaseInsert(TripCount(traps), -1);
00088             return temp.ID;
00089         }
00090 
00091         public override List<Trip> GetAllTrips()
00092         {
00093             List<Trip> tripsFound = new List<Trip>();
00094 
00095             OnDatabaseQuery("Query all trips!");
00096             foreach (XElement element in TryLoadElements(TripsFile)) tripsFound.Add(new Trip(element));
00097             
00098             return tripsFound;
00099         }
00100 
00101         public override List<Trip> GetTripsForUser(string username)
00102         {
00103             List<Trip> tripsFound = new List<Trip>();
00104 
00105             OnDatabaseQuery("Query user: " + username);
00106             foreach (XElement element in TryLoadElements(TripsFile).Where((XElement elem) => elem.Attribute("username").Value == username)) tripsFound.Add(new Trip(element));
00107 
00108             return tripsFound;
00109         }
00110 
00111         public override void UpdateTripDescription(int tripID, string tripDescription)
00112         {
00113             Func<XElement, bool> idFunc = node => node.Attribute("id").Value.Equals(tripID.ToString());
00114 
00115             XElement trips = AssureFileExists(TripsFile, "Trips");
00116             IEnumerable<XElement> result = trips.Elements().Where(idFunc);
00117             if (result.Count() > 0)
00118             {
00119                 XElement node = result.First();
00120                 node.SetAttributeValue("tripdesc", tripDescription);
00121             }
00122             trips.Save(TripsFile);
00123         }
00124         #endregion
00125 
00126         #region ITripService - nodes
00127         public override int AddPositionNode(PositionNode node)
00128         {
00129             XElement nodes = AssureFileExists(NodesFile(node.TripID), "Nodes");
00130 
00131             node.OrdinalNumber = PositionNodeCount(nodes);
00132             nodes.Add(node.ToXElement());
00133             nodes.Save(NodesFile(node.TripID));
00134 
00135             OnDatabaseInsert(-1, PositionNodeCount(nodes));
00136 
00137             return node.OrdinalNumber;
00138         }
00139 
00140         public override void AddManyPositionNodes(IEnumerable<PositionNode> nodes)
00141         {
00142             XElement nodeXML = AssureFileExists(NodesFile(nodes.First().TripID), "Nodes");
00143 
00144             foreach (PositionNode node in nodes)
00145             {
00146                 node.OrdinalNumber = PositionNodeCount(nodeXML);
00147                 nodeXML.Add(node.ToXElement());
00148                 nodeXML.Save(NodesFile(node.TripID));
00149             }
00150 
00151             OnDatabaseInsert(-1, PositionNodeCount(nodeXML));
00152         }
00153 
00154         public override List<PositionNode> GetPositionNodesForTrip(int tripID)
00155         {
00156             List<PositionNode> nodes = new List<PositionNode>();
00157 
00158             OnDatabaseQuery("Query trip: " + tripID);
00159             foreach (XElement element in TryLoadElements(NodesFile(tripID))) nodes.Add(new PositionNode(element));
00160 
00161             return nodes;
00162         }
00163 
00164         public override void UpdatePositionNodeDescription(int tripID, int nodeNumber, string nodeDescription)
00165         {
00166             Func<XElement, bool> nodeNumberFunc = node => node.Attribute("number").Value.Equals(nodeNumber.ToString());
00167 
00168             XElement positions = AssureFileExists(NodesFile(tripID), "Nodes");
00169             IEnumerable<XElement> result = positions.Elements().Where(nodeNumberFunc);
00170             if (result.Count() > 0)
00171             {
00172                 XElement node = result.First();
00173                 node.SetAttributeValue("description", nodeDescription);
00174             }
00175             positions.Save(NodesFile(tripID));
00176         }
00177         #endregion
00178 
00179         #region Counts
00180         public int TripCount(XElement tripRoot)
00181         {
00182             return tripRoot.Elements().Count();
00183         }
00184 
00185         public int PositionNodeCount(XElement positionNodeRoot)
00186         {
00187             return positionNodeRoot.Elements().Count();
00188         }
00189         #endregion
00190     }
